validation_items.question: Is current manual effort quantified in FTE hours/week?

validation_rules.pass_criteria: Manual effort quantified with specific FTE hours/week
validation_rules.na_criteria: Net-new automation with no existing manual process
validation_rules.unknown_criteria: Process mentioned but effort not quantified

validation_items.question: Is process complexity assessed (simple/moderate/complex)?

validation_rules.pass_criteria: Complexity categorized based on decision points and integrations

validation_items.question: Is automation ROI documented with time savings and cost reduction?

validation_rules.pass_criteria: ROI calculated with time savings (hours/week) and cost reduction (%)

validation_items.question: Are integration points documented with system names and protocols?

validation_rules.pass_criteria: Integration points documented with system names, protocols (REST/SOAP), and endpoints
validation_rules.unknown_criteria: Integrations mentioned but systems not identified

validation_items.question: Are data flows mapped between systems?

validation_rules.pass_criteria: Data flows documented showing source → transformation → destination

validation_items.question: Are user workflow changes and training requirements documented?

validation_rules.pass_criteria: Workflow changes and training plan documented
validation_rules.na_criteria: Back-end automation with no user-facing changes
validation_rules.unknown_criteria: Automation mentioned but user impact unclear

validation_items.question: Are data quality standards and validation rules defined?

validation_items.question: Is data classified by sensitivity (public/internal/confidential/restricted)?

validation_rules.pass_criteria: Data classified with sensitivity levels

validation_items.question: Is execution timing documented (real-time/batch/event-driven/scheduled)?

validation_rules.pass_criteria: Timing model documented

validation_items.question: Is automation run frequency specified (hourly/daily/on-demand)?

validation_items.question: Are peak load handling and capacity planning documented?

validation_rules.pass_criteria: Expected transaction volumes and peak load scenarios documented

validation_items.question: Is retry logic and backoff strategy documented?

validation_rules.pass_criteria: Retry attempts, exponential backoff, and circuit breaker patterns documented

validation_items.question: Are automation platform license costs documented?

validation_rules.pass_criteria: License costs quantified for automation platforms and third-party integrations

validation_items.question: Are infrastructure costs (compute, storage, network) estimated?

validation_items.question: Are monitoring metrics and dashboards documented?
